title: Hydrothermal liquefaction of different waste biomass using green solvent 2-methyltetrahydrofuran as extractant and co-solvent
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2589-2597
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00259H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuen Wai Lui, Sze Ha Tsang, Tsz Hin Chan, Ka Hei Chan, Yin Hei Lee, Hoi Fung Man, Matthew Y. Lui
2-Methyltetrahydrofuran (2-MeTHF) is found to be highly beneficial as the extractant or co-solvent for hydrothermal liquefaction (HTL) processes.
